lead_paragraph: The district in Laramie, Wyo., won’t adopt a new policy but will address students by the names they prefer and help them find a bathroom or locker room that fits.

headline.print_headline: Compromising on Rights for Transgender Students
headline.main: Wyoming Schools Look for a Middle Way for Transgender Students

snippet: The district in Laramie, Wyo., won’t adopt a new policy but will address students by the names they prefer and help them find a bathroom or locker room that fits.
abstract: Laramie, Wyo, school board reaches compromise in debate over what bathrooms transgender students may use, opting to accommodate needs of transgender students without instituting formal school policy; board was hesitant to anger either side in debate, much like many schools across country.
